text:
Financial Management Amendment Order 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 8(3) of the Financial Management Act 2016 .

18 June 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Financial Management Amendment Order 2019 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which the Financial Management Act 2016 commences.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Financial Management Act 2016 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Financial Management Act 2016 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 June 2019

This order is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
